post_message: The Obama Administration has no foolproof vetting process, and this is tantamount to rolling out a welcome mat for terrorists to this country. Congressman Jeff Duncan and I have together introduced legislation that would empower states to use their Tenth Amendment authority to opt out of the national refugee resettlement program. Our legislation requires the federal government to inform states of its intent to settle aliens within their borders, and allows governors to reject those aliens if a governor believes that the refugee presents a security risk. Our children’s safety tomorrow depends on our ability to secure America today.
